snippets.snippet: $defines attribute vec3 $auxpos1; uniform float vme;uniform mat4 pmt;uniform mat4 vmt;uniform sampler2D vfv;uniform vec2 vfvs;uniform sampler2D avt;uniform vec2 avts;uniform float ai;uniform float brs;uniform float fte;uniform vec2 wmmv;uniform bool dph;uniform sampler2D cbte;uniform bool rpl;varying vec4 u;varying vec3 v;varying vec3 x; $linearInterpolator $lonlat2position $localTrans $curveInter void main(void){float a=fract($auxpos1.x*2.0/avts.x);float b=floor($auxpos1.x*2.0/avts.y)/avts.y;vec4 c=texture2D(avt,vec2(a,b));if(abs(c.r-$auxpos1.x)<Epsilon){vec3 d=c.gba;a=fract(($auxpos1.x*2.0+1.0)/avts.x);b=floor(($auxpos1.x*2.0+1.0)/avts.y)/avts.y;vec4 e=texture2D(avt,vec2(a,b));vec3 f=e.gba;vec3 g,h,i,j;float k,l;float m=1.0;float n=0.0;if(vme==0.0){d=lonlat2position(d);f=lonlat2position(f);g=(d+f)*0.5;h=normalize(g);i=d-f;k=length(i);g=h*(length(g)+k*0.6);if(k<=500000.0){l=18.0;}else if(k<=1000000.0){l=40.0;}else{l=floor(k*0.00001);}if(dph){n=$auxpos1.z;}else{n=mod($auxpos1.z+(l*2.0+1.0)/ai*fte,l*2.0+1.0);}if((n>=l)&&(n<(l*2.0+1.0))){m=-1.0;n-=l;}vec3 o=normalize(i);vec3 p=g+o*(k*0.6*m);float q=n/l;q=clamp(q,0.0,1.0);if(m<=0.0){j=getPoint(q,g,p,f,f);}else{j=getPoint(q,d,d,p,g);}v=normalize(j);}else if(vme==1.0){d=wgs84ToWebMerc(d);f=wgs84ToWebMerc(f);g=(d+f)*0.5;h=vec3(0.0,0.0,1.0);i=d-f;k=length(i);g=g+h*(k*0.6);if(k<=1000000.0){l=10.0;}else if(k<=2000000.0){l=18.0;}else{l=floor(k*0.000006);}if(dph){n=$auxpos1.z;}else{n=mod($auxpos1.z+(l*2.0+1.0)/ai*fte,l*2.0+1.0);}if((n>=l)&&(n<(l*2.0+1.0))){m=-1.0;n-=l;}vec3 o=normalize(i);vec3 p=g+o*(k*0.6*m);float q=n/l;q=clamp(q,0.0,1.0);if(m<=0.0){j=getPoint(q,g,p,f,f);}else{j=getPoint(q,d,d,p,g);}v=vec3(0.0,0.0,1.0);}gl_Position=pmt*vmt*vec4(j,1.0);x=j;a=fract($auxpos1.y/vfvs.x);b=floor($auxpos1.y/vfvs.y)/vfvs.y;float r=(texture2D(vfv,vec2(a,b))).r;float s=getLinearValue(wmmv,r);if(!dph){gl_PointSize=brs*pow(2.718,s);}u=texture2D(cbte,vec2(s,0.5));}else{vec3 j=vec3(0.0,0.0,0.0);gl_Position=pmt*vmt*vec4(j,1.0);x=j;if(!dph) gl_PointSize=brs;u=vec4(1.0,1.0,0.0,1.0);v=normalize(j);}}
